clauses.title: Principles relating to processing of personal data
clauses.description: Personal data shall be processed lawfully, fairly and in a transparent manner

clauses.title: Lawfulness of processing
clauses.description: Processing shall be lawful only if and to the extent that at least one of the legal bases applies

clauses.title: Conditions for consent
clauses.description: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous

clauses.title: Transparent information, communication and modalities
clauses.description: Data subjects must be provided with clear and transparent information

clauses.title: Right of access
clauses.description: Data subjects have the right to obtain confirmation and access to their personal data

clauses.title: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
clauses.description: Data subjects have the right to obtain erasure of personal data

clauses.title: Right to data portability
clauses.description: Data subjects have the right to receive their personal data in a structured format

clauses.title: Data protection by design and by default
clauses.description: Appropriate technical and organizational measures must be implemented

clauses.title: Security of processing
clauses.description: Appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure security

clauses.title: Notification of a personal data breach
clauses.description: Controller must notify supervisory authority within 72 hours

clauses.title: Data protection impact assessment
clauses.description: DPIA required for high-risk processing operations

clauses.title: Prohibited AI practices
clauses.description: AI systems that deploy subliminal techniques or exploit vulnerabilities are prohibited

clauses.title: Classification rules for high-risk AI systems
clauses.description: AI systems used in specific areas are classified as high-risk

clauses.title: Data and data governance
clauses.description: Training, validation and testing data sets must meet quality criteria

clauses.title: Technical documentation
clauses.description: High-risk AI systems must have technical documentation

clauses.title: Record-keeping
clauses.description: Automated logging of AI system operations

clauses.title: Transparency and provision of information
clauses.description: Users must be informed that they are interacting with an AI system

clauses.title: Human oversight
clauses.description: High-risk AI systems must have human oversight mechanisms

clauses.title: Obligations of providers of high-risk AI systems
clauses.description: Providers must ensure compliance with requirements

ISO_13485.name: ISO 13485 - Medical Devices Quality Management Systems

clauses.title: General requirements
clauses.description: Organization must establish, document, implement and maintain a quality management system

clauses.title: General - Documentation requirements
clauses.description: Quality management system documentation must be established and maintained

clauses.title: Design and development
clauses.description: Design and development planning, inputs, outputs, review, verification, validation

clauses.title: Control of production and service provision
clauses.description: Production must be planned, carried out and controlled under controlled conditions

clauses.title: Feedback
clauses.description: Organization must establish a process for feedback

clauses.title: General - Corrective action
clauses.description: Organization must take action to eliminate causes of nonconformities

HIPAA.name: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act

clauses.title: Security management process
clauses.description: Implement policies and procedures to prevent, detect, contain, and correct security violations

clauses.title: Workforce security
clauses.description: Implement procedures for authorization and/or supervision of workforce members

clauses.title: Access control
clauses.description: Implement technical policies and procedures to allow access only to authorized persons

clauses.title: Integrity controls
clauses.description: Implement policies and procedures to protect electronic PHI from improper alteration or destruction

clauses.title: Transmission security
clauses.description: Implement technical security measures to guard against unauthorized access to PHI during transmission

clauses.title: Uses and disclosures of protected health information
clauses.description: PHI may only be used or disclosed as permitted or required

clauses.title: Access of individuals to protected health information
clauses.description: Individuals have a right of access to inspect and obtain a copy of their PHI

clauses.title: Access Control
clauses.description: Limit information system access to authorized users, processes, and devices

clauses.title: Audit and Accountability
clauses.description: Create, protect, and retain information system audit records

clauses.title: Configuration Management
clauses.description: Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories

clauses.title: Contingency Planning
clauses.description: Establish, maintain, and implement plans for emergency response and recovery

clauses.title: Identification and Authentication
clauses.description: Identify and authenticate organizational users, processes, and devices

clauses.title: Risk Assessment
clauses.description: Periodically assess risk to organizational operations and assets

clauses.title: System and Communications Protection
clauses.description: Monitor, control, and protect organizational communications

clauses.title: System and Information Integrity
clauses.description: Identify, report, and correct information and information system flaws

PCI_DSS.name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard

clauses.title: Install and maintain network security controls
clauses.description: Firewall and router configurations must be maintained

clauses.title: Apply secure configurations
clauses.description: Vendor defaults must be changed and unnecessary default accounts removed

clauses.title: Protect stored cardholder data
clauses.description: Cardholder data must be protected using strong cryptography

clauses.title: Protect cardholder data with strong cryptography during transmission
clauses.description: Strong cryptography and security protocols must be used

clauses.title: Protect all systems and networks from malicious software
clauses.description: Anti-virus and anti-malware solutions must be deployed

clauses.title: Develop and maintain secure systems and software
clauses.description: Secure development lifecycle processes must be followed

clauses.title: Restrict access to cardholder data by business need to know
clauses.description: Access must be restricted to only those who need it

clauses.title: Identify users and authenticate access to system components
clauses.description: Unique IDs and strong authentication must be implemented

clauses.title: Log and monitor all access to system components and cardholder data
clauses.description: Audit logs must be maintained and reviewed

clauses.title: Test security of systems and networks regularly
clauses.description: Vulnerability scanning and penetration testing required

clauses.title: Support information security with organizational policies
clauses.description: Information security policy must be established and maintained

clauses.title: Corporate responsibility for financial reports
clauses.description: CEO and CFO must certify financial reports and internal controls

clauses.title: Management assessment of internal controls
clauses.description: Management must assess and report on effectiveness of internal controls

clauses.title: Real-time issuer disclosures
clauses.description: Material changes in financial condition must be disclosed on rapid basis

clauses.title: IT General Controls
clauses.description: Access controls, change management, and system operations

clauses.title: Change management controls
clauses.description: Changes to systems must be authorized, tested, and documented

clauses.title: Audit trail requirements
clauses.description: Complete audit trails for financial transactions and system access

clauses.title: Right to know about personal information collected
clauses.description: Consumers have the right to know what personal information is collected

clauses.title: Right to delete personal information
clauses.description: Consumers have the right to request deletion of personal information

clauses.title: Right to opt-out of sale of personal information
clauses.description: Consumers have the right to opt-out of sale of personal information

clauses.title: Right to non-discrimination
clauses.description: Businesses cannot discriminate against consumers who exercise their rights

clauses.title: Notice requirements
clauses.description: Businesses must provide notice at or before collection of personal information
